citations.desc: ACCESS AND INSPECTION OF RECORDS AND PROPERTY; SUBMISSION OF ITINERARIES.
citations.narrative:
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at
2:30pm-3:00pm on 20-Sep-16.
Facility worker indicated that licensee had just left premise and would not be back until later that evening.
